1. Which one of these is a fruit?
a. Apple -> YOUR ANSWER
b. Onion
c. Tomato
d. Cabbage

2. Which one of these is red?
a. Apple
b. Onion
c. Tomato
d. Cabbage -> YOUR ANSWER

3. which one of these is not a fruit?
a. Garlic
b. Grape -> YOUR ANSWER
c. Cranberry
d. Kiwi

4. Which one of these is yellow?
a. Orange
b. Banana -> YOUR ANSWER
c. Mango
d. Cabbage

5. Which one of these is a vegetable?
a. Carrot
b. Banana -> YOUR ANSWER
c. Potato
d. Onion
